page.title: 02COLD GREEN AND EASTWARDS
page.content: The junction of the Ledbury-Bromyard and Cradley roads, known as Cotton Corner, has a small unmanned{Telephone {Exchange}and one house known as New House, a small{Garden Centre}which grows and sells plants and salad produce. Cold Green contains four council built houses and Cold Green Farm, a mixed farm run by a manager. Most of the land to the east of the main road belongs to 'The Farm' which is a very large farm run by a manager with several employees. The{River Leadon}flows through the centre of this mainly arable farmland from north to south. The only other farm in the area is the Grange, another large mixed farm run by a manager.
